text.div:
This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include all codes defined in http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/CodeSystem/JP_JfagyFoodAllergenCodes_CS
  • Include all codes defined in http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/CodeSystem/JP_JfagyNonFoodNonMedicationAllergenCodes_CS
  • Include all codes defined in http://jpfhir.jp/fhir/Common/CodeSystem/JP_JfagyMedicationAllergenCodes_CS

name: JP_AllergyIntoleranceCodes_VS
title: JP Core AllergyIntolerance Codes
publisher: FHIR Japanese implementation research working group in Japan Association of Medical Informatics (JAMI)
